phrases: Why is she calling you Haru ?
Since when has she called you Haru ?
Why did you start calling me Haru?
But... even though it was painful to hear you talk about it... it was okay.
Did you guys all sleep okay last night?
When I opened my eyes, it was morning.
It is always like that, though.
I did not sleep that well.
I was actually thinking about Manato.
If I were on my own, and I knew I could avenge Manato...
It does not seem like me, huh.
You guys are here, and I am here.
So let us get out of here alive.
That day, we let Manato die.
I do not think I will ever forget that pain.
So we all have to get out of here alive.
We have everyone here now, and we have Merry, too.
I am a Priest who let my friends die.
And we let our Priest die.
So we will not let anyone else die.
Merry, you feel the same way, right?
I will protect all of you.
I will never let another friend die.
So, what with this Haru thing?
Repeating a yesterday filled with scrapes,
We clear the path to a hopeful tomorrow.
The voice I raised upwards scattered into the air.
The reality I have gamed is hazy,
and even if I cannot see ahead of me,
I can keep moving forward on this long road
Connecting a bond covered in dust,
We join back to back in the past and future.
Repeating an answer full of mistakes,
I will reach out my hands to seek the light, again and again.
Why are not they coming after me?
These guys know how humans fight.
You bastard, you will not get away for hurting Yume!
It will be hard on my own!
O light, return to Lumiaris' divine protection.
I am as tough as can be!
He seems like a different person.
O light, return to Lumiaris' divine protection.
Do not scare me like that.
I-I thought I could get him if I got closer.
All right, just a little more.
Let us show them that what we have done so far was not for nothing!
It is kill or be killed, no offense.
This is just like how Manato... damn it!
Just... hurts more than I thought.
He is on the rooftop, though!
I would been thinking this whole time about what to say to him once this day came.
It seems like we spent a long time together...
So I kind of know, but I kind of do not know what I want to say.
He was friendly, easy to talk to, and smart.
He could do anything and was reliable.
But maybe I just did not realize what his faults were.
He might have been hiding his flaws.
If we had spent more time together, maybe I would have seen another side of him.
I wish I knew him more.
I wish I knew more about what kind of person he was.
If we had more time, we would have gone through more things together.
Maybe we would have gotten annoyed at each other and fight.
Maybe we would have disliked each other... or liked each other more.
We have become real Volunteer Soldiers.
Back then, we did not have the money to buy our badges, and we had to be frugal with what we spent on food.
We did not know if we could afford lodging for the next day, and we did not even have enough for new underwear.
I went commando, like a man.
Despite everything, we have become proper Volunteer Soldiers.
It is not like we did not have the money to buy the badges...
That is what we all decided.
it did not matter either way for me.
You guys just kept nagging me.
Do not make such maliciousful remarks at a time like this!
You will just be hated more.
I am a Dark Knight, so I am supposed to be hated!
It is malicious not maliciousful, by the way.
Um, maybe we can give it now?
We pooled our money with the money you left us.
If you can hear us, you might be chuckling and thinking we did not have to get a badge for you.
You would think it was a waste of money, and that we should have used that money for equipment.
We would not listen to you though, whatever you said.
We have become a good party.
I healed them with my magic.
I need to mend my clothes, though.
It would be nice if you could mend clothes with magic, too.
You do not seem that happy.
Even though you finally got to avenge your friend.
It is just the first time anybody's called me that.
Clothes you have to mend by hand...
It was so painful for us just losing Manato...
I was just thinking about it.
You do not want to talk about it, huh.
There are wounds that even magic cannot heal...
But... even though it was painful to hear you talk about it...
the dry air after a rain
The warmth you gave this hand
led me to a future I can treasure
I wonder when you became so strong.
I will probably find what I searched the vast world for
at the end of this journey.
draw near and wipe away tears.
You said everything these eyes see will connect to one path
Take me to the same place.
A prayer reaching to the heavens.
The endless night is over now.
Now serialized on the official anime web site.
